```{r}
library(tidyverse)
rm(list = ls())
set.seed(1618)
cbbPalette <- c("#999999", "#E69F00", "#56B4E9", "#009E73", "#F0E442", 
                "#0072B2", "#D55E00", "#CC79A7", "#c5679b", "#be548f")

load('../results/0.98_mdd_results.Rdata')
load('../results/rf_0.98_mdd_results.Rdata')
```


```{r}
pboth <- ggplot(npdr_w_wo_sex, aes(x = nlog10.nosex, y = nlog10.sex)) + 
  geom_point(alpha = 0.7, shape = 21, size = 2.5, aes(fill = nlog10.sex.genes)) + 
  geom_hline(yintercept = -log10(0.05), linetype = 2, alpha = 0.8, color = cbbPalette[1]) + 
  geom_vline(xintercept = -log10(0.05), linetype = 2, alpha = 0.8, color = cbbPalette[1]) + 
  geom_abline(slope = 1, intercept = 0, alpha = 0.5, linetype = 3) +
  annotate("text", 13, -log10(0.05) + 0.2, label = "0.05 FDR", 
           size = 3, color = cbbPalette[1]) +
  annotate("text", -log10(0.05) - 0.2, 7.5, label = "0.05 FDR", 
           size = 3, color = cbbPalette[1], angle = 90) +
  labs(x = bquote('Vanilla NPDR ('~-log[10]~'p'[adj]~')'),
       y = bquote('Sex-adjusted NPDR ('~-log[10]~'p'[adj]~')'),
       fill = bquote(''~-log[10]~'p'['adj.sex'])) +
  ggrepel::geom_text_repel(aes(label = sig.genes), #check_overlap = TRUE, 
            hjust=-0.12, vjust=1.5, fontface = "italic",
            size = 3, segment.alpha = 0.3) +
  viridis::scale_fill_viridis(option = 'B', direction = -1) + 
  theme_bw() + theme(legend.position = c(0.9, 0.75)) +
  coord_fixed(ratio = 1) 
pboth
ggsave(pboth, filename = '../figs/npdrs_mdd.pdf')
```


```{r}
npdr_rf_df <- npdr_w_wo_sex %>%
  select(att, beta.npdr.sex, nlog10.sex.genes, sig.genes) %>%
  merge(rf_imp_sorted, by = 'att')

set.seed(1618)
p_npdr_rf <- ggplot(npdr_rf_df, aes(x = MeanDecreaseGini, y = beta.npdr.sex)) + 
  geom_point(alpha = 0.7, shape = 21, size = 2, aes(fill = nlog10.sex.genes)) + 
  labs(x = bquote('Random forest permutation importance'),
       y = bquote('Sex-adjusted NPDR'~beta),
       fill = bquote(''~-log[10]~'p'['adj.sex'])) +
  ggrepel::geom_text_repel(aes(label = sig.genes), #check_overlap = TRUE, 
            hjust=-0.12, vjust=1.5, fontface = "italic",
            size = 3, segment.alpha = 0.3) +
  viridis::scale_fill_viridis(option = 'B', direction = -1) + 
  theme_bw() + theme(legend.position = c(0.75, 0.1),
                     legend.direction = 'horizontal') 
p_npdr_rf

ggsave(p_npdr_rf, filename = '../figs/npdr_rf_mdd.pdf', width = 6, height = 4)

```
